episodes.title: Part 1
episodes.plot: The German U-Boat crew embarks on its mission at the beginning of World War II.

episodes.title: Part 2
episodes.plot: The crew is trying to carry out its mission which has proven to be extremely difficult.

episodes.title: Part 3
episodes.plot: For almost four weeks, the submarine is traveling south-west of Ireland and is held underwater by a destroyer during its first attack on an English convoy. Exploding depth charges hurl the crew and submarine into chaos.

episodes.title: Himmelfahrtskommando
episodes.plot: The U 96 encounters a convoy and sinks three cargo ships with its torpedoes. Then a 24-hour pursuit of the submarine begins with two destroyers dropping depth charges. The end for U 96 seems to have come.

episodes.title: Auf Grund
episodes.plot: The U 96 has been dispatched to the Mediterranean. After picking up supplies in the Spanish town of Vigo, the journey to Gibraltar begins.

episodes.title: In der Heimat
episodes.plot: The submarine is heavily damaged, lying on the ocean floor in a depth of 280 meters. Despite the seemingly hopeless situation, the crew starts with repair work and dares an attempt to emerge.
